policyDescription:
• 03.05.07 - Password Management (PARTIAL)
Technical: Enforces 8-character minimum passcode length and passcode requirement for device access.
Still Required: Maintain list of commonly-used and compromised passwords. Implement password checking against breach databases. Document cryptographic protection for passwords. Define composition/complexity rules. Establish password transmission security. Implement password change on first use after account recovery.
Evidence: Password management policy, compromised password database, password audit logs, cryptographic implementation documentation.

• 03.04.02 - Configuration Settings (PARTIAL)
Technical: Establishes iOS device security configuration baseline (passcode requirements).
Still Required: Expand configuration baseline to cover all iOS security settings (encryption, app restrictions, network settings, etc.). Document approved configurations. Identify and approve any deviations. Align with iOS security benchmarks (CIS, Apple Security Guides).
Evidence: iOS configuration baseline documentation, configuration compliance reports, approved deviation documentation, configuration audit logs.
